info.title: J-Expert Recruitment Backend API
info.description: Backend API for J-Expert recruitment system using Clean Architecture. Supports JWT authentication via Supabase with HS256/RS256 algorithms.

get.description: Check if the system is operational

post.description: Login with email and password via Supabase
Register a new user with email, password, and role. Supports Turnstile Captcha.
Send password reset email to user. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: Reset email sent if account exists

post.description: Set new password using reset token from email link
Sync user profile from JWT to local database

get.description: Get details of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Send a message through the contact form. This is a public endpoint.

get.description: Get a list of active jobs for public access. No authentication required.
Get detailed info of an active job. No authentication required.
Get a list of jobs with pagination and company info

post.description: Create a new job posting. Allowed roles: employer, admin

403.description: Only employers or admins can create jobs

get.description: Get detailed info of a job with company profile
Retrieve a company profile for public viewing. Some details may be hidden based on viewer status.
Get a list of jobs belonging to the logged-in employer. Allowed roles: employer, admin

403.description: Only employers can access their job list

get.description: Retrieve the employer's own company profile for editing. Allowed roles: employer, admin

403.description: Only employers can access company profiles

put.description: Create or update the employer's company profile. Allowed roles: employer, admin

403.description: Only employers can update company profiles

get.description: Get all applications for a specific job. Allowed roles: employer, admin

403.description: Only employers can view job applications

get.description: Get full application details including candidate profile. Allowed roles: employer, admin

403.description: Only employers can view application details

patch.description: Update the status of an application. Allowed roles: employer, admin

403.description: Only employers can update application status

get.description: Get the profile of the currently logged-in candidate

post.description: Submit an application for a job. Allowed roles: candidate only (must be verified)

403.description: Only candidates can apply to jobs

get.description: Get all applications submitted by the current candidate
Get the verification status of the current candidate

put.description: Update candidate verification profile data and work experiences

post.description: Upload a file (image/pdf) and get a URL. Images are compressed automatically.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: Target bucket (CV, Profile_Picture, JLPT, Company_Logo, Company_Gallery)

get.description: Get the verification status of the current user. Functionally equivalent to /candidates/me/verification.
Returns counts for users, companies, jobs, and applications. Allowed roles: admin only
Returns paginated list of users with optional role filter. Allowed roles: admin only

post.description: Creates a new user record. Allowed roles: admin only

put.description: Updates an existing user record. Allowed roles: admin only

delete.description: Permanently deletes a user record. Allowed roles: admin only

patch.description: Toggles user disabled status. Allowed roles: admin only

get.description: Returns paginated list of companies with optional status filter. Allowed roles: admin only

patch.description: Approves or rejects a company verification. Allowed roles: admin only

get.description: Returns paginated list of jobs with optional status filter. Allowed roles: admin only

patch.description: Toggles job visibility. Allowed roles: admin only
Marks a job as suspicious. Allowed roles: admin only

get.description: Get paginated list of account verifications. Allowed roles: admin only
Get a single verification with work experiences. Allowed roles: admin only

post.description: Approve or Reject an account verification request. Allowed roles: admin only
